title: Leadership Competency Enhancement: Microlearning-Based Mathematical Problem Solving for Advanced Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: College-level or higher foundational mathematics knowledge and professional fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Through 3-minute microlearning modules, over 90% of learners can accurately explain core concepts by breaking down complex mathematical theories step-by-step.
Learners improve their ability to apply mathematical principles to professional work scenarios by over 70% by completing five weekly action-oriented assignments.
In project-based assessments conducted every two weeks, learners can analyze real-world work cases and propose solutions using problem-solving strategies acquired from microlearning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
